name: road-closures-for-cma-awards-cmapocalypse-2008
title: Road Closures for CMA Awards [CMApocalypse 2008]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
It’s that time again – Time for more road closures, courtesy of the CMApocalypse… er, CMA Awards. The worst has already started, but prepare for even more before it’s all over on Thursday. 

TODAY

  • Demonbreun closed between 5th and 6th Ave
  • Broadway closed from 2nd to 18th Ave until 1pm
  • Broadway/Demonbreun exit is closed on I-65 until 1pm
TOMORROW
  • 5th Ave closed from Franklin St to Broadway beginning at 5am
  • Demonbreun closed between 4th and 6th Ave
  • Clark Place closed between 6th and 7th Ave beginning at rush hour 3:30pm
  • 6th Ave closed between Broadway and Peabody St, also beginning at 3:30pm
  • Franklin St closed between 4th and 6th Ave beginning at 3:30pm
  • Demonbreun closure expands to 7th Ave beginning at 3:30pm
All roads will open on Thursday by 2am, except for Demonbreun between 5th and 6th Ave, which will reopen by 3pm Thursday. 
Photo by MobilFunk7.
